Articles.Content:
I challenge you to beat my circularization record! My record has a offset of 11m, wich is very good!

Proof of my record:

http://imgur.com/bZxpeN9

Also one thing to consider is the constant changing orbit!

I wish all of you who are trying the very best of luck!
1 meter out. no autopilot or any of that jazz
That's easy, all you need is an ant engine.

That's easy, all you need is an ant engine.

ion engine on a large ship

although large ships tend to shift their Ap/Pe a lot just by rotating... maybe ion engine on a small ship

Interesting challenge but it seems Boffinbox has won, the only thing you can do after his attempt is use a tiny probe and an Ion engine like zarakon says.

And a pic of a orbit with zero difference in Ap and Pe would be a little boring now.

See if you can think of a way to spice up the next challenge Rjhere

Closing!
